QuestData.Title: A Pilgrimage Gone Awry
QuestData.Description: My sister and I were traveling to Auchindoun to pay our respects to my grandmother when we hit an overturned rock and lost control of our caravan. I managed to survive, but my sister...$B$B<Nadur cries.>$B$BPlease, I need your help. If you could bring me some prowler blood, snapdragon flowers, and a riverhopper eye, I can fashion a potion to bring her back... I just know I can...
QuestData.LogDescription: Gather $1oa Prowler Blood, $2oa Snapdragon Fronds, and a Riverhopper Eye.
QuestData.CompletionText: I don't know what I would do without Tuliaa... she's not just my sister. She's my best friend.
QuestData.RewardText: Thank you, a thousand times thank you.
